ygData.subject: Re: Rarely mentioned fact...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Your primary defense against ice/fire giants is Togors. I can tank an ice giant on my own with one shaman healing me if it is drowsied.  I m not sure
ygData.messageBody:
> We didn't get a chance to try varying strategies, but I
> suspect having one tank (someone with parry and riposte) per
> extra giant would save the clerics a lot of mana. Another
> option may be rooting the extras some distance away (assuming
> they can be rooted).

Your primary defense against ice/fire giants is Togors.
I can tank an ice giant on my own with one shaman healing
me if it is drowsied. I'm not sure rooting the giant will
help because of duration issues. Then again, I've never
seen anyone root a L45+ giant.

Harm.
